Class MethodBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spazedog.lib.reflecttools.bridge.MethodBridge

  • public abstract class MethodBridge
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  MethodBridge.BridgeParams
      Container used by bridgeBegin(BridgeParams) and bridgeEnd(BridgeParams)

      Used by MethodBridge.BridgeParams.bridgeType to identify the system used to invoke a hook

    • Method Detail

      • attachBridge

        public final MethodBridge.BridgeOriginal attachBridge(java.lang.reflect.Member member)
        Create a bridge between this callback and the parsed Member
        Parameters:
        member - The Member to bridge

      • bridgeBegin

        public void bridgeBegin(MethodBridge.BridgeParams params)
        This method is invoked before the Original. If you want to skip the Original method, just set a custom result using MethodBridge.BridgeParams.setResult(Object)
        Parameters:
        params - Contains information about the original member and the arguments parsed to it

      • bridgeEnd

        public void bridgeEnd(MethodBridge.BridgeParams params)
        This method is invoked after the Original, or after bridgeBegin(BridgeParams) if the Original has been skipped.
        Parameters:
        params - Contains information about the original member and the arguments parsed to it

      • bridgeAttached

        public void bridgeAttached(java.lang.reflect.Member member,
                  MethodBridge.BridgeOriginal original)
        Called once the bridge has been attached
        Parameters:
        member - The member where the bridge was attached to
        original - An MethodBridge.BridgeOriginal instance that can be used to call the original member. This is meant to be used outside of the hooked method. Use invokeOriginal from MethodBridge.BridgeParams if you are executing from within the hook.
